platform.model

Class NetworkLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.model.PlatformComponentProp
      • platform.model.NetworkLink

  • public class NetworkLink
extends PlatformComponentProp
    Represents a Network Link in the platform.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Cluster destinationCluster
      Destination cluster of the network link.
      private int destinationPort
      Destination port number of the network link.

      Destination processor of the network link.

      Latency of the network link.

      Source cluster of the network link.
      private int sourcePort
      Source port number of the network link.
      private Processor sourceProcessor
      Source processor of the network link.

    • Field Detail

      • sourcePort

        private final int sourcePort
        Source port number of the network link.

      • destinationPort

        private final int destinationPort
        Destination port number of the network link.

      • latency

        private final int latency
        Latency of the network link.

      • sourceCluster

        private final Cluster sourceCluster
        Source cluster of the network link. (can be null, but then sourceProcessor should not be null).

      • destinationCluster

        private final Cluster destinationCluster
        Destination cluster of the network link. (can be null, but then destinationProcessor should not be null).

      • sourceProcessor

        private final Processor sourceProcessor
        Source processor of the network link. (can be null, but then sourceCluster should not be null).

      • destinationProcessor

        private final Processor destinationProcessor
        Destination processor of the network link. (can be null, but then destinationCluster should not be null).

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkLink

        public NetworkLink(java.lang.String name,
           int id,
           int sourcePort,
           int destinationPort,
           int latency,
           Processor srcProcessor,
           Processor dstProcessor,
           Cluster srcCluster,
           Cluster dstCluster)
        Initializes the Network Link component of the platform.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the processor
        id - id of the processor
        sourcePort - source port where the link starts
        destinationPort - destination port where the link ends
        latency - latency of the network link
        srcProcessor - source processor
        dstProcessor - destination processor
        srcCluster - source cluster
        dstCluster - destination cluster
